name: A-Z of Collective Animal Nouns Trivia Game | Animals | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
Colony.

	A herd of antelopeAn army of antsA shrewdness of apes

Wake.

	A flange of baboonsA sleuth of bearsA rabble of butterflies

Bask.

	A glaring of catsA pack of coyotesA parcel of crows

Raft.

	A rangale of deerA drove of donkeys

Parade.

	A swarm of eelsA gang of elkA mob of emus

Charm.

	A cast of ferretsA business of fliesA colony of frogs

Cluster.

	A tower of giraffesAn implausability of gnusA horde of gnats

Mute.

	A clan of hyenasA kindle of haresAn array of hedgehogs

Mess.

	A herd of ibexA colony of ibisesA rabble of insects

Party.

	A smack or fluther of jellyfishA husk of jackrabbits

Mob.

	A kindle of kittensA circus of keas (a New Zealand bird)A concentration of kingfishers

Group.

	A leap of leopardsA herd of llamasA sault of lions

Richness.

	A mischief of miceA barren of mulesA troop of monkeys

Watch.

	A gam or pod of narwhalsA kettle of nighthawks

Pitch.

	A stare of owlsA bed of oystersA romp of otters

Aurora.

	A nye of pheasantsA coterie of prairie dogs A prickle of porcupines

questions.text: What collective noun beginning with 'b' do you give to a group of quails?
questions.explanation:
Bevy & bevy.

	Also a covey.

Unkindness.

	A rabble of ratsA nursery of raccoonsA drove of rabbits

Surfeit.

	A dray of squirrelsA shiver of sharksA trip of sheep

Candle.

	A turn of turtlesA raffle of turkeysA creep of tortoises

questions.text: What is the collective noun used to describe unicorns?
questions.explanation: Blessing & blessing.

Herd.

	A den or bed of vipersA wake of vultures

Sneak.

	A rout of wolvesA sounder of boarsA warren of wombats

Herd.

	A colony of yellow jackets (a type of wasp)A school or run of yellow belly (a type of fish)

questions.text: What is one of the collective nouns for a group of zebras?
questions.explanation:
Stripe & stripe.

	Also a crossing or herd of zebras!
